title: Introduction to C++
subject: C++ Programming
theory:
**C++** is a general-purpose programming language created by **Bjarne Stroustrup** as an extension of the C programming language, or 'C with Classes'. 
It supports Object-Oriented, Procedural, and Generic programming.

interview_questions.question: Is C++ a pure Object Oriented Language?
interview_questions.answer: No. It supports procedural programming (like C) and primitive types (int, char) are not objects.

real_world_use_cases.description: Unreal Engine is written in C++ for performance.
